connection-loading.title: Establishing connection
connection-loading.subtitle1: Establishing a secure connection to protect your credentials. This may take up to 30 seconds.
connection-loading.subtitle2: Keep the app open and your phone unlocked. If nothing happens after 30 seconds, completely exit and restart the app.

connection-confirm.title: Accept connection?
connection-confirm.subtitle: This will allow you to receive or share credentials.
